sentences: Rajery, born Germain Randrianrisoa, is a player of the valiha from Madagascar who founded the modern valiha orchestra.
Rajery was born in 1965 in the northern part of Madagascar.
Since 2006, Rajery has been a member of the musical trio 3MA, with which he tours and records.
Anarouz (Six Degrees Records, 2017, as a member of 3MA)
